thread.title: BRIEF-CSI Compressco Offers $350 Million Senior Secured First Lien Notes

title: BRIEF-CSI Compressco Offers $350 Million Senior Secured First Lien Notes
text: March 5, 2018 / 7:21 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-CSI Compressco Offers $350 Million Senior Secured First Lien Notes Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 5 (Reuters) - CSI Compressco LP: * CSI COMPRESSCO LP ANNOUNCES OFFERING OF $350 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR SECURED FIRST LIEN NOTES * CSI COMPRESSCO LP - ‍COMMENCED PRIVATE OFFERING, WITH UNIT, OF $350 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR SECURED FIRST LIEN NOTES DUE 2025​ * CSI COMPRESSCO-TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO REPAY OUTSTANDING BORROWINGS UNDER EXISTING REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY, TERMINATE THAT FACILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
